While credited as a Tom and Jerry cartoon, this is not the cat-and-mouse team but an earlier Mutt-and-Jeff rip-off featuring them going about to survive their descendents placed amongst skyscrapers of the future that features problems with walking upright. Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it was still produced more than 60 years ago! That's like watching Star Trek as compared to Star Trek XI and think it was pretty lame.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an attempt to catch the wave of martial arts popularity ; It borrows many characteristics of Ninja (1984), Enter The Ninja (1981) and Revenge of Ninja (1983).
